passwordReset.emailNotFoundContactSuppor: Email not found. Please contact {supportEmail} for support.
passwordReset.emailNotValid: Please enter a valid email address.
passwordReset.title: Forgot password
passwordReset.confirmedText: We've sent you an email from {adminEmail} with instructions to reset your password. Make sure it didn't wind up in your spam mailbox. If you aren't receiving our password reset emails, contact {supportEmail}. Please note that the link in this email will expire in {expiry} hours.
passwordReset.text: Happens to everybody! Add your address and an email will be sent with further instructions.
